entry.title: New release for Checkmate: V2.0
entry.content:
Checkmate 2.0

With the introduction of Infrastructure Monitoring, you can now monitor key details like CPU usage, memory, temperate and disk performance, and set alerts to catch issues before they become problems. We've added Docker container monitoring to help you track your containers more easily. This version also comes with better stability and bug fixes as well.

Major features

  • Infrastructure monitors
  • Infrastructure monitors measure a variety of stats about the hardware of the target machine.
    • CPU usage
    • CPU temperature
    • Memory usage
    • Disk usage
  • You can set thresholds for each metric for when you want to be alerted.
    • Example: If the CPU usage threshold is 60%, you will be notified when usage exceeds 60%.
  • Requires Checkmate agent to be running on the target machine.

Minor features

  • Docker container monitoring
  • Monitor the status of Docker containers
  • Requires exposing the Docker daemon
    • Currently supports connection to docker daemon by unix socket

Minor fixes

  • There are some minor bug fixes for robustness, reliability, and clarity.

Full changelog: https://github.com/bluewave-labs/bluewave-uptime/commits/master

entry.title: New release for Checkmate: V2.0.1
entry.content:
Checkmate 2.0.1

This release mainly implements UI fixes. There are some minor bug fixes and refactoring included in this release as well.

Minor features

  • Light/Dark mode button moved to sidebar

Minor fixes

  • Docker scripts have been updated
  • UI and Color fixes throughout the app
  • There are some minor bug fixes throughout for stability and maintainability

Contributors

A special shout out to all the new contributors that have added their touch to this project. You've made our application better for having added your code to it and we appreciate all your help!

entry.title: New release for Checkmate: v2.0.2
entry.content:
Checkmate 2.0.2

This release focuses on performance improvements and UI tweaks

Minor features

  • New color system implemented for MUI theme

Major fixes

  • Move to using MongoDB's aggregation pipeline for more efficient queries.
  • Monitors query is now under 100 ms (down from several seconds)
  • Group data by hours or days ( depending on selected window) to reduce checks to a reasonable number
  • Incidents page now has filtering, which makes it quite fast to retrieve data

Minor fixes

  • UI and color fixes throughout the app
  • Minor bug fixes for stability

Contributors

As always thank you to all the contributors to this project, we would not be this far without your help!

Changelog

entry.title: New release for Checkmate: V2.1
entry.content:
Checkmate 2.1

We're excited to announce the release of Checkmate 2.1, which includes several new features, improvements, and bug fixes since version 2.0.2.

Major features

  • Notification integration: We now support notifications on
  • Slack
  • Discord
  • Telegram
  • Generic webhook
  • Localisation
  • Added comprehensive internationalization (i18n) support with language selection in settings. Added Russian and Turkish language support with translations for distributed uptime monitoring features
  • Integration is via POEditor. You can join a translation team here.
  • Status pages, which can provide information about the operational health of your services.
  • JSON query monitoring
  • Bulk importing of monitors from other platforms

Minor features

  • Better UI for settings
  • E-mail settings are now configured in the UI
  • Google PageSpeed API key is now configured in the UI
  • Removed reverse proxy from Client image so you can add your own reverse proxy
  • Rather than centering the dashboard, the sidebar is positioned on the left.
  • Better colors, fonts, gaps throughout the UI
  • Filters for incidents, uptime and infrastructure monitoring
  • Option to ignore TLS/SSL errors and continue checking the website's availability

Major fixes

  • Removed ports directive from Mongo and Redis, as these ports don't need to be exposed

Minor fixes

  • Many UI fixes throughout the application

Notable changes

  • Pagespeed api key can now be configured in settings page. Previously it was an environment variable.
  • Checkmate client port is now 52345 (previously it was 5000)

Documentation

  • Updated documentation portal at docs.checkmate.so
  • Added installation instructions for various deployment methods including Coolify and Elestio
  • Expanded user guides for new features

Contributors

We've had more than 30 contributors to the project since the last release and we're very grateful for all the contributions. Thank you all for helping make Checkmate awesome!

-- Checkmate Core team (@ajhollid, @vishnusn77, @mohicody, @gorkem-bwl, @Owaiseimdad, @Br0wnHammer and @mertssmnoglu)

entry.title: New release for Checkmate: v2.1.1
entry.content:
Checkmate 2.1.1

This is a minor follow-up release for 2.1, intended to fix bugs and introduce small features.

Major fixes

  • E-mail issues on settings page resolved

Minor features

  • Introduced ARM CPU support
  • Allow testing of email without saving settings
  • Added port to monitor name in maintenance window search item
  • It is now possible to add ping monitors to a status page

What's Changed

  • feat: build multi-arch images for dist by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2267
  • update workflow by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2268
  • fix: TypeError in hardware notifications for null disk values by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2273
  • hotfix: remove arm64 config by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2277
  • Fix: Port Validation Uptime by @Br0wnHammer in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2279
  • Enabling SMTP Relay with Nodemailer by @catilgan-nextension in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2271
  • Fix: Infra Uptime Percentage by @Br0wnHammer in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2285
  • fix: update strings for email settings by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2283
  • feat: unified details header by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2284
  • hotfix: uptime-percentage by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2287
  • Changed error msg of invalid of Docker container ID by @Anurag123Chauhan in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2281
  • hotfix: graceful error hanlding, unordered write by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2290
  • update package-lock by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2292
  • Consistent font sizes across all create/configure pages by @vishnusn77 in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2302
  • Bump vite from 5.4.18 to 5.4.19 in /client by @dependabot in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2296
  • feat: settings test email endpoint by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2293
  • fix: status page feature checkboxes not saving (Fixes #2274) by @remememe in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2298
  • Email test button added in details page. by @Owaiseimdad in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2295
  • Added incidents page in the details header. by @Owaiseimdad in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2308
  • feat: job queue refactor by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2291
  • fix: monolithic docker by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2311
  • fix aciton name by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2312
  • Fix/action name by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2313
  • update config by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2314
  • feat: jobqueue error handling by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2309
  • Feature/email testing without saving by @mohicody in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2294
  • Added pause button in configuration page. by @Owaiseimdad in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2317
  • feat: arm dist by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2321
  • init script isntead of healthcheck by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2322
  • Feat/arm support by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2323
  • hsts:false by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2324
  • update helmet policy by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2325
  • fix: test email by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2329
  • Add ping monitoring to status pages (#2299) by @mohicody in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2330
  • Fix: Optionally show IP/URL of the monitor in status page by @AsimAhmedSiddiquii in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2327
  • Show port monitors with port numbers. by @sonvir249 in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2335
  • hotfix: remove showurl validation by @ajhollid in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2338

New Contributors

  • @fredrikburmester made their first contribution in https://github.com/bluewave-labs/Checkmate/pull/2273
